.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7f9a2d062886c7b6f69ff116bd532445039957bee0d2d8fdc6fd0204c75606ce","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://7e71039bd4f52c5bb48d9d675328af5e1b45bf35197db2d3c39a6e915f9ae62f","dweb:/ipfs/QmNgnB2M5BPfj1s7AXdwNgPM54q3KLRauw8CBw7BY8ENnY"]},"contracts/protocol/libraries/math/WadRayMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf66b7e208da18d12ca2b6a5c9d58f8091819da1524c028f30a36304993039c72","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://75519c3d78ad40da70a1d24cf10557068d6726c894bbc6674531c73302ecc610","dweb:/ipfs/Qmea7Q6ysFm9WH69EZLak7wCeT7Fcw4H9qMZGAUA52QoRf"]},"contracts/protocol/libraries/types/DataTypes.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa6cff11e3fe86f3cb405b84f0541eee0fcec9f73bc2ce0e209b1f329d0290981","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://45550a649f69e012c40bb039538736c21358cafb657918d1151ef11560fec134","dweb:/ipfs/QmY68BqymeHPoqaQinjDVpxcuJFEom1Yy9hhpdi9FsS9ob"]},"contracts/protocol/tokenization/IncentivizedERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9f029bf95d49cddde84c4902988391fba1b7f7f67ac965a44ddcf0e3e1c7d165","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://98376f251c790a3cddca699d88dfa5babc6dd8970c556221d360ec9576d25dd8","dweb:/ipfs/QmVzJe6yMchNeHmsTNoSmWimr2MKzE2g48Te1opwicHhLv"]},"contracts/protocol/tokenization/VariableDebtToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8bf6b7ad860bc65813cb2f9e61ca0bb259b1f021d8818d3145c27136005099cb","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://f0de6c43c7a8bb60dec7eab8f1751c6d7b2a3c66fa881ef262af70e4a76de88b","dweb:/ipfs/QmRPU9fD2tzZ9oUVpYVqVrQoEgegTHfVTuPGK3LCHRwGHm"]},"contracts/protocol/tokenization/base/DebtTokenBase.sol":{"keccak256":"0x77fd2c21622f35832de9cb9a55591d741d3d71d94e1572560f81bb41188cf311","license":"agpl-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://4899b896b957e4115a4a698df8df008121c3484c50ed548e101fbba696dec27c","dweb:/ipfs/QmXHNMpiYK8tqmwCew5hTRmkKhFhf3x34uZQQbpzsb7JaX"]}},"version":1}

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the allowance of spender on the tokens owned by owner

params.spender: The user allowed to spend the owner's tokens

returns._0: The amount of owner's tokens spender is allowed to spend*

approve(address,uint256).details: Allows `spender` to spend the tokens owned by _msgSender()

params.spender: The user allowed to spend _msgSender() tokens

approveDelegation(address,uint256).details: delegates borrowing power to a user on the specific debt token

params.amount: the maximum amount being delegated. Delegation will still respect the liquidation constraints (even if delegated, a delegatee cannot force a delegator HF to go below 1)*
params.delegatee: the address receiving the delegated borrowing power

balanceOf(address).details: Calculates the accumulated debt balance of the user

returns._0: The debt balance of the user*

borrowAllowance(address,address).details: returns the borrow allowance of the user

params.toUser: The user to give allowance to

burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Burns user variable debt - Only callable by the LendingPool

params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve*
params.user: The user whose debt is getting burned

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Decreases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()
params.subtractedValue: The amount being subtracted to the allowance

getScaledUserBalanceAndSupply(address).details: Returns the principal balance of the user and principal total supply.

returns._0: The principal balance of the user

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Increases the allowance of spender to spend _msgSender() tokens

params.addedValue: The amount being added to the allowance
params.spender: The user allowed to spend on behalf of _msgSender()

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints debt token to the `onBehalfOf` address -  Only callable by the LendingPool

params.amount: The amount of debt being minted
params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve
params.onBehalfOf: The address receiving the debt tokens
params.user: The address receiving the borrowed underlying, being the delegatee in case of credit delegate, or same as `onBehalfOf` otherwise

returns._0: `true` if the the previous balance of the user is 0*

scaledBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the principal debt balance of the user from

returns._0: The debt balance of the user since the last burn/mint action*

scaledTotalSupply().details: Returns the scaled total supply of the variable debt token. Represents sum(debt/index)

totalSupply().details: Returns the total supply of the variable debt token. Represents the total debt accrued by the users

transfer(address,uint256).details: Being non transferrable, the debt token does not implement any of the standard ERC20 functions for transfer and allowance.*

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Executes a transfer of token from sender to recipient, if _msgSender() is allowed to do so

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred

documentation.text:
@dev Gets the revision of the stable debt token implementation
 @return The debt token implementation revision*

@dev Calculates the accumulated debt balance of the user
 @return The debt balance of the user*

@dev Returns the principal debt balance of the user from
 @return The debt balance of the user since the last burn/mint action*

@dev Returns the total supply of the variable debt token. Represents the total debt accrued by the users
 @return The total supply*

@dev Returns the scaled total supply of the variable debt token. Represents sum(debt/index)
 @return the scaled total supply*
